external_games.name: Five Nights with Mac Tonight: Halloween Special

name: Five Nights with Mac Tonight: Halloween Special
storyline:
It's October of 2018. And there is only a few days left until Halloween. Everyone preparing costumes, putting up decorations and getting that candy ready. While the McDonald's company has decided to take a rather strange turn in this years celebration.
This Halloween, McDonald's is opening a "McFright" attraction, bringing back nostalgic mascots in a scary and terrifying way for this night of spooks. And the McFright needs a worker to maintain security and to handle the attractions around the building.
What's in store for you?
summary: Five Nights with Mac Tonight: Halloween Special is a Halloween-themed version of the FNwMT series.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: Very spooooooky | Five Nights with Mac Tonight Halloween special | Night 1
